reviewText: Too much talking from Robert Klein and not enough of the "shticks" from the advertised comedians.
It was exactly what I wanted and I love it
My husband and I loved this movie when we saw it and bought it for three friends who laughed their way through it too
Terrific and informative. You don't have to be Jewish to love this DVD. After all, funny is funny

I loved it.  This story should be part of a museum and tell the history to the world of the legendary history of the Catskill resorts.  Perhaps,
sometime in the future someone will realize the importance and the profound impact the Catskill resorts had on American culture.
Very funny-"ah, what do you know from funny"
Fantastic, funny,good review of the rise and fall of the Catskills Borst Belt.
a loving tribute to the comedy  in the catskills, in an era goneby.  those who can relate to it will love it. others, not so much.
Wonderful! Good memories of famous yesteryear comedians.

This Movie was about the Jews who were Entertained in the Catskills,by my Uncle,Henry Tobias,Entertainer.  He was the brother of  Charles Tobias,.  Harry Tobias Inducted into Songwriters Hall Of Fame.  He Henry Tobias wrote the book,"THE  BORSCHE BELT" about the life of  People in the Catskills.  Enjoy,Henry Tobias made me laugh all my life  for 50 years. Jeffrey Tobias
A wonderful look at the old-school Jewish comics who came out of the Catskills
